title: Drawing, "Rocks at the Coast, Grand Manan Island, Canada", September 2, 1851
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on light tan paper
markings: Watermark:  F Johannot, with impressed stamp; Cooper Union stamp in brown, lower center verso:   Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left:  Sep 2d. 1851/Half Tide - Flood
description: Group of tall rocks off coast, lower half of rocks covered with lichens or moss, upper half bare rock.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rocks at the Coast, Grand Manan Island, Canada", September 2, 1851.
September 2, 1851. Graphite, brush and white gouache on light tan paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-398-a.
